summary: This document is an email chain from November 2020 discussing investigative follow-up regarding a potential witness, Melissa Solomon-De Freitas, whose summer camp tuition was allegedly paid by Jeffrey Epstein. The emails reference a podcast interview with her and coordination between law enforcement agents to contact her for an interview.

persons.name: Melissa Solomon-De Freitas
persons.context: A student whose summer camp tuition at Interlochen was allegedly paid by Jeffrey Epstein; she was interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell and is a person of interest for law enforcement interviews.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the alleged payer of summer camp tuition for Melissa Solomon-De Freitas at Interlochen.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Epstein regarding dealings with the potential witness Melissa Solomon-De Freitas.

connections.description: Epstein allegedly paid the summer camp tuition for Solomon-De Freitas at Interlochen.
Solomon-De Freitas discussed her dealings with Maxwell on a podcast, indicating some form of acquaintance or interaction.

events.title: Review of Interlochen records
events.description: Law enforcement reviewed records received from Interlochen Arts Academy, identifying that Epstein paid the summer camp tuition of student Melissa Solomon-De Freitas.

events.title: Podcast text sharing
events.description: A law enforcement agent texted a copy of a podcast interview with Melissa Solomon-De Freitas about her dealings with Epstein and Maxwell.

events.title: Coordination for witness interview
events.description: Email coordination between law enforcement agents regarding reaching out to Melissa Solomon-De Freitas for an interview and requesting records from Interlochen.

locations: Interlochen (likely Interlochen Center for the Arts/Interlochen Arts Academy)
New York (implied from email domain nypd.org)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein allegedly paid the summer camp tuition of a student named Melissa Solomon-De Freitas at Interlochen.
Melissa Solomon-De Freitas was interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
Law enforcement agents in 2020 were actively seeking to interview Melissa Solomon-De Freitas as a potential witness.
The email chain shows coordination between law enforcement agents regarding obtaining records from Interlochen and contacting the witness.
One agent was traveling to Aruba and would be out of phone contact, indicating ongoing investigative work during personal travel.
